Introduction

Gawon is a South Korean-American singer, rapper, dancer, and model under The Black Label. She is the main vocalist and sub rapper of the South Korean girl group MEOVV.

On August 23, 2024, Gawon was revealed as the second member of MEOVV. The group officially debuted on September 6, 2024, with their debut digital single "MEOW".
